mapper.select: select comm_seq, user_id, comm_reply_seq, comm_reply_content, comm_reply_writen_date, refer, depth from ( select comm_seq, user_id, comm_reply_seq, comm_reply_content, to_char(comm_reply_writen_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi') as comm_reply_writen_date, refer, depth from community_reply where comm_seq =#{comm_seq} ) start with refer =0 connect by prior comm_reply_seq = refer order SIBLINGS by comm_reply_seq
mapper.insert: insert into community_reply(comm_reply_seq, comm_seq, user_id, comm_reply_content, comm_reply_writen_date, step, refer, depth) values (comm_reply_seq.nextval,#{comm_seq},#{user_id},#{comm_reply_content},sysdate,0,0,0)

insert into community_reply(comm_reply_seq, comm_seq, user_id, comm_reply_content, comm_reply_writen_date, step, refer, depth) values (comm_reply_seq.nextval,#{comm_seq},#{user_id},#{comm_reply_content},sysdate,0,#{comm_reply_seq},1)
